author: veithen
msg: Fixed an issue that may cause the tests to hang (for a long time): in some cases, AxisTestClient may call Object#wait(0) which is the same as Object#wait().

author: mor
msg: Fixed an issue with grouping of order on picking screens. Earlier when user selects any grouping methods (except zero grouping which means user has not selected any
grouping methods) then the Find Orders to Pick screen wasn't showing any thing if the FacilityLocation (Warehouse Area) is not setup in the system.

msg: synapse configuration schema - at a very early stage / need a lot more work for this to be completed :-)

msg: Add manifest entries to javadoc and source jars
